The authorities in #SierraLeone have announced a three-day nationwide lockdown as the country registers a second case of the coronavirus. Defence minister and #Covid19 Coordinator, Brig (Rtd) Kellie Conteh says Sunday, Monday & Tuesday are stay-at-home days.

Doctors in #SierraLeone have asked the Gov‚Äôt to extend the 3-day lockdown to 14 days - the #Covid19 incubation period. They call for protective gear for all health facilities and a ‚Äúdesignated and adequate facility‚Äù for affected frontline health workers‚Äù, plus compensation.

For the few that are lucky to have a job in #SierraLeone, it‚Äôs just fair that they‚Äôre paid their March salaries before the #COVID19 lockdown on Saturday. It‚Äôs bad enough not to have already paid them, and far worse to not pay them up to then.
